titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct a bridge on Federal land west of and adjacent to Folsom Dam in California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 16 - 14.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on 107-651, Part I.

Referred sequentially to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure for a period ending not later than Oct. 4, 2002 for consideration of such provisions of the bill and amendment as fall within the jurisdiction of that committee pursuant to clause 1(q), rule X.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 450.

bill.summary: 9/11/2002--Reported to House amended, Part I. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a project to construct a bridge on Federal land west of and adjacent to Folsom Dam in California.Requires the Secretary to enter into an agreement to transfer the bridge to the City of Folsom which shall assume full responsibility for its operation and maintenance.
